Pasutri Ditangkap saat Antar Makanan Isi Sabu ke Rutan Polrestabes Medan
04 Nov 2019, 21:42 by Datuk Haris Molana
Medan - Pasangan suami istri ditangkap petugas penjagaan Mapolrestabes Medan, Sumut. Pasutri ini menyelundupkan sabu dalam makanan yang dibawa untuk tahanan di Rutan Polrestabes Medan.
Kasat Sabhahara Polrestabes Medan, AKBP Sonny Siregar mengatakan penangkapan dilakukan sekitar pukul 18.00 WIB, Senin (4/11/2019). Pasutri ini berinisial Y dan A.
"Mereka hendak menyerahkan makanan di pos penjagaan Mapolrestabes kepada salah seorang tahanan. Namun, saat dicek ternyata di dalam makanan itu berisi lima paket sabu," kata AKBP Sonny Siregar kepada wartawan.
Pasutri ini sudah diserahkan ke satuan narkoba Polrestabes Medan untuk pemeriksaan lanjutan. Saat datang ke Rutan Polrestabes Medan, pasutri ini juga membawa anak.
"Sudah kita serahkan ke satuan narkoba. Mereka sementara kita tahan dulu untuk pemeriksaan lanjutan terkait barang haram tersebut. Untuk anaknya, nanti kita titipkan ke keluarganya," ujar Sonny.

Pasutri Arrested while Delivering Savings of Methamphetamine to Medan Polrestabutan Detention Center
Nov 04 2019, 21:42 by Datuk Haris Molana
Medan - A married couple was arrested by the Medan Mapolrestabes guard officer, North Sumatra. This couple smuggled methamphetamine in food brought for prisoners in the Medan Policerest Detention Center.
Kasab Sabhahara Polrestabes Medan, AKBP Sonny Siregar said the arrest was made at around 18:00 WIB, Monday (11/04/2019). This couple initials Y and A.
"They wanted to hand over food at the Mapolrestabes guard post to one of the detainees. However, when checked it turned out that it contained five packets of methamphetamine," AKBP Sonny Siregar told reporters.
The couple had already been handed over to Medan's Polrestabes drug unit for further investigation. When he came to the Medan Policerest Detention Center, the couple also brought a child.
"We have handed it over to the narcotics unit. They temporarily detained us for further examination related to the illicit goods. For their children, we will leave it to their families," said Sonny.
